description:
Whether your dropping the hammer on your weekend club ride, or living out a Miami Vice fantasy, these retro shades will keep you sun safe and looking great. Made using lightweight recycled materials, the Velo balance sustainability and style.

  • Polarized lenses cut through reflections, great for use around water, snow, pavement and anywhere else glare lies in wait
  • Recycled plastic frames are strong and light
  • Frame fits well with most bike helmets and encourages airflow
  • Grippy rubber nose pads
  • 6-base curvature provides a comfortable wrap without being too sporty
  • Packaging contains no single use plastic
  • Semi-hard case and microfibre bag included
  • Sunski is part of 1% for the planet
  • Sunski found its inspiration from an Australian surf trip, with the goal of making quality sunnies affordable
  • Medium to large fit sunnies that work best on medium faces
name: Sunski Velo Sunglasses - Unisex
